ps.ptxt: Shift solenoid valve No.2 circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Pressure control solenoid valve circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Output shaft speed sensor circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.
Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.
Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.
Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Accelerator pedal position sensor circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent referring to DTC P0122: Throttle Position Sensor (Main) Circuit Low , DTC P0123: Throttle Position Sensor (Main) Circuit High , DTC P0222: Throttle Position Sensor (Sub) Circuit Low and DTC P0223: Throttle Position Sensor (Sub) Circuit High .
Refer to No Gear Shift to 4th Gear
Substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
